    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Synthesis of m-RNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synthese von McRns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Synthèse du m-ARN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Síntese do m-m-RNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sintesi di m.-RNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση m-RNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Síntesis del m-m-RNA</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the molecular processes involved in the synthesis of m-RNA and is translation into proteins</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">RNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">RNA Synthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die molekularen Prozesse 
zeigt, die in die Synthese von McRns mit einbezogen werden und 
Übersetzung in Proteine ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les processus 
moléculaires impliqués dans la synthèse du m-ARN et est traduction 
dans des protéines</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre os processos molecular 
envolvidos na síntese do m-m-RNA e seja tradução em proteínas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra i processi molecolari 
ha coinvolto nella sintesi di m.-RNA ed è traduzione nelle proteine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τις μοριακές 
διαδικασίες περιέλαβε στη σύνθεση m-RNA και είναι μετάφραση 
στις πρωτεϊ'νες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra los procesos 
moleculares implicados en la síntesis del m-m-RNA y es traducción en
las proteínas</string>
          </description>
